title: Mariage - Aron et Stéphanie
heading: Mariage
de
Aron
et
Stéphanie
preface: We are looking forward to our wedding, and we would kindly ask you to save the dates as we hope to see you at the venue you find most suitable

events.title: Wedding in Denmark
events.description: We would be pleased to see you for our wedding at ? church in Copenhagen, Denmark
